typeDescription.name: com.xerox.xrce.uima.util.xmlstrip.uimatypes.OffsetBlock
typeDescription.description: A span of the plain-text sofa that corresponds to a contiguous span of the original XML sofa

featureDescription.name: xmlBegin
featureDescription.description: The character offset in the XML sofa of the start of this span

featureDescription.name: xmlEnd
featureDescription.description: The character offset in the XML sofa of the end of this span
